data.comment: Christof Dierick starts the match. Oud-Heverlee with the kick-off in Ostend.
Arthur Theate (Oostende) has received a yellow card from Christof Dierick.
In the minute 11, At Versluys Arena, Toon Raemaekers has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! Fashion Sakala gives Oostende a 1-0 lead.
Oostende's Makhtar Gueye has been booked in Ostend.
In the minute 36, The home team have replaced Robbie D'Haese with Theo Ndicka. This is the first substitution made today by Alexander Blessin.
Fashion Sakala (Oostende) has received a first yellow card.
Thibault Vlietinck (Oud-Heverlee) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 72, Marc Brys (Oud-Heverlee) is making a first substitution, with Milan Tucic replacing Thibault Vlietinck.
Goal! Oud-Heverlee reduce the deficit to 3-1 through Mathieu Maertens.
That's full-time at Versluys Arena. The final score is 3-1.
